xwikidoc.name: TemplateTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: TemplateTranslations
xwikidoc.content:
# Various translations that are used in the workspace template and, implicitly, in the created workspaces.
# Rebrand the term 'Wiki' to 'Workspace' in the menu of a workspace. To be used by the workspace template and in all created workspaces. core.menu.type.wiki=Workspace core.menu.watchlist.add.wiki=Watch Workspace core.menu.watchlist.remove.wiki=Unwatch Workspace core.menu.admin.wiki=Administer Workspace
# WORKSPACE INFORMATION PANEL workspacemanager.panel.title=Workspace information
# MESSAGES platform.workspace.wikiNotWorkspace=The current wiki is not a workspace. platform.workspace.gadgetWelcomeToWorkspace=Welcome to the **{0}** workspace. platform.workspace.currentUserIsOwner=You are the owner of this workspace. platform.workspace.currentUserIsAdministrator=You are an administrator of this workspace. platform.workspace.joinNeedToLogIn=To join this workspace you need to be logged in. platform.workspace.currentUserNotMember=You are not a member of this workspace. platform.workspace.currentUserCanJoin=If you like, you can [[join this workspace>>path:{0}]]. platform.workspace.currentUserIsMember=You are a member of this workspace. platform.workspace.currentUserCanLeave=If you like, you can [[leave this workspace>>path:{0}]]. platform.workspace.gadgetTopActiveUsersAllMembers=To see the full list of workspace members, you can use the [[User Directory>>Main.UserDirectory]] page. platform.workspace.invitationPendingForCurrentWorkspace=You have been invited to join this workspace platform.workspace.joinRequestPendingForCurrentWorkspace=You have requested to join this workspace platform.workspace.joinRequestAcceptedNotification=Your request to join the workspace ''{0}'' has been accepted. platform.workspace.joinRequestRejectedNotification=Your request to join the workspace ''{0}'' has been rejected. platform.workspace.candidateHandledSaveComment=Handled candidate {0} ({1}) platform.workspace.candidateHandledComment=Comment: platform.workspace.candidateAcceptedSuccess=Request accepted successfully. platform.workspace.candidateRejectedSuccess=Request rejected successfully. platform.workspace.inviteUserAlreadyMember=The user is already a member of the workspace. platform.workspace.inviteRequestAlreadyExists=The user already has a pending request. Please respond to the request instead. platform.workspace.inviteUserAlreadyInvited=The user already has a pending invitation. platform.workspace.inviteSaveComment=User ''{0}'' has been invited to join the workspace. platform.workspace.inviteNotification=You have been invited to join the workspace ''{0}''. platform.workspace.inviteSuccess=User invited successfully. platform.workspace.invitationCancelSaveComment=Cancelled invitation {0} ({1}) platform.workspace.invitationCancelNotification=Your invitation has been cancelled and is no longer valid. platform.workspace.invitationCancelSuccess=Invitation cancelled successfully.
# Duplicated from WorkspaceManager.Translations. To be removed when the 2 are merged. workspacemanager.error.workspacedoesnotexist=Workspace [{0}] does not exist platform.workspace.exceptionWithMessage=Exception: {0}
# LABELS workspacemanager.prop.wikiprettyname.label=Pretty Name workspacemanager.prop.description.label=Description workspacemanager.prop.owner.label=Owner workspacemanager.prop.membershipType.label=Membership Type workspacemanager.prop.secure.label=Secure (SSL) workspacemanager.member.add=Add or invite user to workspace platform.workspace.gadgetWorkspaceInformationLabel=Workspace Information platform.workspace.gadgetTopActiveUsersLabel=Top Active Members platform.workspace.panelInformationNameLabel=Name platform.workspace.panelInformationDescriptionLabel=Description platform.workspace.panelInformationMembersLabel=Members platform.workspace.invitationActionViewLabel=View Invitation platform.workspace.joinRequestActionCancelLabel=Cancel Request platform.workspace.joinRequestActionRequestLabel=Request Join platform.workspace.joinActionJoinLabel=Join platform.workspace.leaveWorkspace=Leave Workspace platform.workspace.inviteUserNameLabel=User name platform.workspace.inviteMessageLabel=Message platform.workspace.inviteInviteButtonLabel=Invite platform.workspace.candidatesLabel=Candidates platform.workspace.candidateStatusLabel=Status: platform.workspace.candidateTypeLabel=Type: platform.workspace.candidateReviewerLabel=Admin: platform.workspace.candidateReviewerMessageLabel=Admin's Message: platform.workspace.candidateReviewerPrivateComment=Private Comment: platform.workspace.candidateAcceptLabel=Accept platform.workspace.candidateRejectLabel=Reject platform.workspace.invitationCancelLabel=Cancel Invitation platform.workspace.workspaceUsersTitle=Workspace Users platform.workspace.manageWorkspaceTitle=Workspace XWiki.WorkspaceCandidateMemberClass_status_pending=Pending XWiki.WorkspaceCandidateMemberClass_status_accepted=Accepted XWiki.WorkspaceCandidateMemberClass_status_rejected=Rejected XWiki.WorkspaceCandidateMemberClass_type_request=Request XWiki.WorkspaceCandidateMemberClass_type_invitation=Invitation
# HINTS workspacemanager.prop.wikiprettyname.hint=The display name of the workspace. workspacemanager.prop.description.hint=A brief description of the workspace and its purpose. workspacemanager.prop.owner.hint=A user who will have all the rights on the workspace. workspacemanager.prop.membershipType.hint=The way users can join this workspace. workspacemanager.prop.secure.hint=If enabled, all this wiki's generated externals URLs will starting with //https:~/~///. platform.workspace.inviteUserNameHint=The name of the user to add to the workspace. platform.workspace.inviteMessageHint=The message to send to the user. platform.workspace.candidatesHint=Users which have requested or which have been invited to join the workspace.
# DESCRIPTIONS admin.xwiki.manageworkspace.description=Manage settings such as workspace name, description, owner and membership type. admin.xwiki.workspaceusers.description=Manage workspace members: add, remove, invite, accept or reject workspace members.
